channel.title: Comments on: Running migration in an Exrm release
channel.description: Plataformatec's place to talk about Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Elixir, and software engineering

item.title: By: Martin Schurig
item.dc:creator: Martin Schurig
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2016/04/running-migration-in-an-exrm-release/comment-page-1/#comment-1603">josevalim</a>.
Oh, I found the reason
I replaced all "Application" parts with my application name. But the only thing to replace was the "my_app" and "MyApp" part
item.content:encoded:
In reply to josevalim.

Oh, I found the reason

I replaced all “Application” parts with my application name. But the only thing to replace was the “my_app” and “MyApp” part
